title: Em be Ha Noi - The Little Girl of Hanoi (1975 - Vietnam) war
description:
Em bÃ© HÃ  NÃ´i (1975 - North Vietnam)                    The Little Girl of Hanoi

Drama / War
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0327681/


        Moscow International Film Festival - 1 Award WIN and 1 NOMINATION

After the American B-52 bombing of Kham Thien Street and Bach Mai hospital, little Ngoc Ha's family is shattered. Her mother has died trying to save children in a kindergarten, her seriously-injured younger sister is brought to a hospital, and Ngoc Ha encounters a variety of strangers as she wanders the war-torn streets of Hanoi looking for her father.

A great classic of Vietnamese cinema, filmed in Hanoi amidst the smoke and rubble of the actual 1972 Christmas bombardment. One of the most remarkable movies ever made anywhere during wartime - full of exquisite and startling images - which offers a rare view of Hanoi during the Vietnam War. It was produced in 1973 by veteran director Hai Ninh and won the Golden Lotus honour for best feature film at the Vietnam Film Festival in 1975.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 716x468, 23.976 fps, 1850 Kbps, 01h12m14s
